author: Dan Weinheimer
text:
We used to call our October event A&I (Awards and Installation)…but you asked for us more education and content. We are working on scheduling an awesome event with a keynote speaker, concurrent sessions, installation of new officers and time for networking (yes, this is a group of overachievers!).  But we need a name for this new, jam packed event. 
Name that Event Competition:  Submit your suggestions to vicepresident@mmasc.org by Monday, May 23 to enter the contest. One submission will win free admission to the event.
title: Event Title Competition
